title: More Than 160 Additional Indigenous Graves Have Been Found In Canada
content:
1. More Than 160 Additional Indigenous Graves Have Been Found In Canada  NPR
  2. Global National: July 13, 2021 | Over 160 graves found at former residential school on BC island  Global News
  3. More unmarked graves discovered in British Columbia at a former indigenous residential school known as 'Canada's Alcatraz'  CNN
  4. At least 160 undocumented graves found at B.C. residential school  CityNews
  5. Finding more unmarked graves in B.C. 'hurts so much,' says First Nations leader  CBC.ca
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
